abilities.name: An Acquired Taste
abilities.description: Innate: Tahm Kench's basic attacks deal 4% of his maximum health bonus magic damage. Against enemy  champions they also apply An Acquired Taste stack for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The stacks decay once every 0.67 seconds after the stacks reach the full duration.
descriptions: Innate: Tahm Kench's basic attacks deal 4% of his maximum health bonus magic damage. Against enemy  champions they also apply An Acquired Taste stack for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. The stacks decay once every 0.67 seconds after the stacks reach the full duration.
Tongue Lash and  Devour gain additional effects against enemies with three stacks.

abilities.name: Tongue Lash
abilities.description: Active: Tahm Kench lashes his tongue in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them for 3 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Tahm Kench lashes his tongue in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slowing them for 3 seconds.
If an enemy champion is struck while at three  An Acquired Taste stacks, they're also  stunned for 2 seconds, consuming all stacks.

During Tongue Lash,  Devour can be cast for no  mana expenditure to devour the  minion or non-epic  monster struck at the cost of no longer dealing Tongue Lash's damage. Devour's mana refund does not apply in this case.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Active: Tahm Kench swallows the target enemy  minion, non-epic  monster or allied  champion for up to 4 seconds. Swallowed units are rendered  untargetable and cannot perform any actions. If the target is an enemy, they are instantly  stunned for 0.5 seconds and  suppressed for the cast time and while swallowed.
descriptions: Active: Tahm Kench swallows the target enemy  minion, non-epic  monster or allied  champion for up to 4 seconds. Swallowed units are rendered  untargetable and cannot perform any actions. If the target is an enemy, they are instantly  stunned for 0.5 seconds and  suppressed for the cast time and while swallowed.

Tahm Kench can swallow a target enemy champion for up to 2 seconds if they have three  An Acquired Taste stacks, doing so consumes all of them. If Tahm Kench swallows a champion, he becomes unable to cast movement spells and is  slowed by 95% for the duration.
Swallowing an enemy refunds 50% of Devour's  cooldown and  mana cost.

After 1 second, Devour can be recast into  Regurgitate while Tahm Kench's belly is full, and automatically does so at the end of the duration. Allied champions can exit at will after the same delay, unless they're  immobilized.

abilities.name: Thick Skin
abilities.description: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percentage of the damage he takes as Grey Health on his health bar, up to a maximum of 100% of his missing health.
descriptions: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percentage of the damage he takes as Grey Health on his health bar, up to a maximum of 100% of his missing health.
While Thick Skin is available, and after taking no damage for 2.5 seconds, Tahm Kench rapidly  heals for 30% − 100% (based on level) of his Grey Health over time.
Active: Tahm Kench converts his current Grey Health into a  shield that lasts for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Abyssal Voyage
abilities.description: Active: Tahm Kench  channels for up to 6 seconds, highlighting the path to his intended destination to allied champions while opening his maw to offer up to one of them the chance to come with him. Abyssal Voyage can be recast 0.25 seconds after starting the channel. If an ally has climbed in, they immediately become  untargetable and Tahm Kench automatically begins a 1.65-second  channel that, when completed, renders Tahm Kench also  untargetable and causes him and his ally to  blink to the target location, both becoming unable to perform actions for 1 second and afterwards becoming targetable again.
descriptions: Active: Tahm Kench  channels for up to 6 seconds, highlighting the path to his intended destination to allied champions while opening his maw to offer up to one of them the chance to come with him. Abyssal Voyage can be recast 0.25 seconds after starting the channel. If an ally has climbed in, they immediately become  untargetable and Tahm Kench automatically begins a 1.65-second  channel that, when completed, renders Tahm Kench also  untargetable and causes him and his ally to  blink to the target location, both becoming unable to perform actions for 1 second and afterwards becoming targetable again.
Recast: Tahm Kench manually begins the channel to  blink to the target location. Allies can still join him while they have the chance during this time.
Abyssal Voyage is put on a 10 second  cooldown if the second channel is not started or is  interrupted.
Allies must be out of combat with enemy champions to come with Tahm Kench. Tahm Kench may also not start the channel if he has  Devoured someone.

name: Tahm Kench
title: the River King
blurb: Known by many names throughout history, the demon Tahm Kench travels the waterways of Runeterra, feeding his insatiable appetite with the misery of others. Though he may appear singularly charming and proud, he swaggers through the physical realm like a...
